name: Buddy (itch) (tekegames)
description:
Hello,

This game is my first 3D project. i abandoned because too hard. If it gets more than 10 downloads I develop again. In this alpha version, you can at walk around the house.

what's missing? : Jumpscares, enemy, music, sound effects

and so many bug :)  

thanks for downloading, enjoy.

And please write if you have any suggestions.

Q = Drop

E = Interact

WASD = Walk 

ESC = Pause Menu
